# Model Evaluation

* Regression Model Insights
  * Evaluation Metrics Include:
    * mean squared error
    * mean absolute error
    * r-sq
  * Evaluation Plots include:
    * Residual Plots
    * Calibration Plots
    * Copula Scatter of Predicted vs Actual
    * Partial Dependence Plots
    * Variable Importance Top N Features
  * Variable Importance
    * Global Variable Importance
    * Global Interaction Importance (CatBoost only)
    * Shapely Global Importance
    * shapely Drill-Down Importance for Dim and Time Subsets
    
* Binary Classification Model Insights
  * Evaluation Metrics Include:
    * Comprehensive confusion matrix metrics
    * Utility score for cost sensitive evaluation
    * Multi-threshold plots for dual threshold analysis
  * Evaluation Plots include:
    * Calibration Plots
    * ROC Plot
    * Gains Plot
    * Lift Plot
    * Partial Dependence Plots
    * Variable Importance Top N Features
  * Variable Importance
    * Global Variable Importance
    * Global Interaction Importance (CatBoost only)
    * Shapely Global Importance
    * shapely Drill-Down Importance for Dim and Time Subsets

* MultiClass Model Insights
  * Evaluation Metrics Include:
    * Comprehensive confusion matrix metrics
    * Utility score for cost sensitive evaluation
    * Multi-threshold plots for dual threshold analysis
  * Evaluation Plots Include:
    * Calibration Plots
    * ROC Plot
    * Gains Plot
    * Lift Plot
    * Partial Dependence Plots
    * Variable Importance Top N Features
  * Variable Importance
    * Global Variable Importance
    * Global Interaction Importance (CatBoost only)
    * Shapely Global Importance
    * shapely Drill-Down Importance for Dim and Time Subsets
